welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Cape Canaveral, where the warm sunshine and charming beaches await you! Known for its stunning rocket launches and breathtaking views, we invite you to explore and indulge in all the wonders our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Merritt Island Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Space Coast Regional Airport handles all commercial flights and services.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Space Coast Regional Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal is used for domestic flights operated by major airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal is used for domestic flights operated by regional airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
